gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

Class AbstractRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.AbstractRelation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Relation, SemanticItem, java.lang.Comparable<SemanticItem>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreferenceChain, Event, ImplicitRelation, Modification, Predication

    public abstract class AbstractRelation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Relation
    The basic implementation of the Relation interface. It does not assume that the relation has a predicate, so this allows implicit relations and coreference chains as subtypes.

    A resolved relation is one in which all logical argument types are identified.

    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu
    See Also:
    Predication, Event, ImplicitRelation

      • getArgs

        public java.util.List<Argument> getArgs(java.lang.String name)
        Finds the arguments with a particular role. Allows approximate matches ( e.g., ADJUNCT role will return ADJUNCT_TO, ADJUNCT_IN, etc.)
        Parameters:
        name - the role name
        Returns:
        arguments whose role begin with the name
